scripts.antora: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html site.yml
scripts.antora-local: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html --url http://localhost:8080 site.yml
scripts.antora-staging: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html --url https://doc.staging.owncloud.com site.yml
scripts.antora-bundle: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html --ui-bundle-url ../docs-ui/build/ui-bundle.zip --url https://doc.staging.owncloud.com site.yml
scripts.antora-dev-local: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html --url http://localhost:8080 site-dev.yml
scripts.antora-dev-bundle: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility static --generator ./generator/generate-site.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html --ui-bundle-url ../docs-ui/build/ui-bundle.zip --url http://localhost:8080 site-dev.yml
scripts.validate: antora --stacktrace generate --cache-dir cache --redirect-facility disabled --generator ./generator/xref-validator.js --clean --fetch --attribute format=html site.yml
